summary: 5 beautiful girls win a contest to star in a new reality show. Spend a night in a haunted house, and the first one to make contact with a ghost will win. But the house is really haunted by a killer who intends that none of them will win.
cast: Martin Kove|Katherine Norland|Liana Mendoza|Oliver Rayon|Vincent Rivera|Lucy Treadway|Joanna Zanella|Connie Chen|Maribel Montalvo|Shana May Jackson|Orit Shuckroon
title: Reality Terror Night
